title: Alienwareâ€™s upcoming 34-inch QD-OLED monitor has a hefty price tag
content:
Alienware has announced the pricing of its upcoming AW3423DW monitor. The 34-inch gaming monitor is the first to launch with Samsung’s Quantum Dot OLED (QD-OLED) panel. The monitor was first showcased at CES 2022, but the company revealed no pricing or availability details at the time. In a recent tweet, Alienware revealed (via The Verge)

The post Alienware’s upcoming 34-inch QD-OLED monitor has a hefty price tag appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Alienware has announced the pricing of the AW3423DW QD-OLED monitor. The monitor will start shipping out in early Spring. Read on.
